description:
Business Development Consultant

Just Love Coffee Franchising Company seeks a highly motivated individual to support the growth of the brand.

Be genuine, Be excellent, and Be a catalyst for love, are the core values that drive who we are. We are seeking someone with restaurant leadership experience, who embodies our core values, and who has a passion for helping others be successful.

Thanks to the delicious coffee, savory food, and friendly atmosphere, Just Love Coffee Cafe serves as a "community spot" rather than just a place that sells great items.

Enjoy Purpose with a Paycheck:

Become part of a brand dedicated to serving others! The brand has already given back over $500,000 to adoptive families and much more to various non-profits. As a Business Development Consultant, you will have the opportunity to coach, share, and promote Just Love’s core values to Franchisees, Employees, Vendors, and customers across the United States.

If you have an extensive background in restaurant operations, with at least 3 years in Multi-unit management, including P&L management, scheduling, and ordering as well as have a passion for developing others, we would Just Love to talk to you.

Primary Objectives:

· Collaborate with Franchisees on building Profitable Sales

· Provide feedback and direction on P&L performance to franchisees or management.

· Communicate Home Office Goals and Objectives

· Inform Franchisee of upcoming promotions, events, operational changes, etc.

· Live our Core Values: Be Genuine, Be Excellent, Be a Catalyst for Love

Responsibilities:

· Monthly P&L reviews

· Quarterly Operations visits

· Training and Development

· Work specifically with your assigned group of franchisees.

· Visit Locations (Up to 70% travel)

· Generate reports with an action-based summary of visits.

We are looking to hire the right person soon, please submit a resume, and why you feel like you would be right for this position.

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:
• 401(k)
• Dental insurance
• Health insurance
• Paid time off
• Vision insurance

Schedule:
• 8 hour shift
• Weekends as needed

Experience:
• Operations management: 3 years (Required)
• Strategic planning: 3 years (Required)
• Restaurant management: 5 years (Required)
• Restaurant experience: 7 years (Required)

Willingness to travel:
• 75% (Preferred)

Work Location: In person
